title: Unleashing the Power of Cobalt Pyroborate: Superior Performance in Sulfate Radical Advanced Oxidation Processes
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00516C, Paper
En-Xuan Lin, Fang-Yu Wu, Yu-Lun Zhu, Yu-Rong Chang, Po-Yi Wu, Pei Yuin Keng
This study presents a structurally robust, cobalt pyroborate (Co2B2O5) as a heterogeneous for advanced oxidation process (AOP). The Co2B2O5 nanoparticles were systematically characterized and employed to activate peroxymonosulfate (PMS) effectively...
